data.text: Egha Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn mɨgei:
Ezɨ puvatɨ, me arazir aghuim ataki.
O Samariaba, kɨ ian golɨn bulmakaun marvir guar kam bar an aghua.
Israelian ingangarir gumazir mam marvir guar kamɨn ingari.
Men arazir kuram, mati pura amɨnir muziarim,
Me donkin atiabar mɨn puvɨra akaba batosi,
Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn kɨ bar me akuvagh
“Efraimia arazir kuraba gɨn amadir ofa damuasa,
Kɨ men sure damuasa uan arazir avɨriba osiri.
Me ofan avɨribagh amua ofa gamir asɨzibar tuziba api.
“Israelia ghaze, atriviba ti men akurvaghamin gavgaviba itima,
